meanings.definition: The quality or state of being patchy.
meanings.sent1: The patchinesses of the quilt made it unique.
meanings.sent2: The artist intentionally created patchinesses in the painting for a modern look.
meanings.sent3: The patchinesses of the lawn made it look like a checkerboard.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling had a patchinesses to it, jumping from one topic to another.
meanings.sent5: The patchinesses of the clouds created a beautiful sunset.

meanings.definition: The presence of patches or irregular areas.
meanings.sent1: The patchinesses on the wall were due to the uneven paint job.
meanings.sent2: The patchinesses of the forest floor allowed sunlight to filter through.
meanings.sent3: The patchinesses of the map confused the hikers on their trail.
meanings.sent4: The patchinesses of the old rug revealed its age and history.
meanings.sent5: The patchinesses of the sky hinted at an upcoming storm.
